entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Estevan Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Point 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wet snow over southern sections early this morning. Risk of hail and thunderstorms this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
